title: Food Garden by Enigma
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Italian, Western, Buffet, Fast food, Take-out, European, Romanian
description: In the Iulius Mall Food Court you will find this vegetarian restaurant offering a daily selection of prepared food displayed in a glass steamboat as well an a la carte menu of burgers, salads, and other dishes. Has sweets and cake slices. Over 90% of the food is vegan. Since 2015.
